source.query:
select  to_char(EFF_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), EFF_TIME, CAST(CAST(((EFF_TIME ) (FORMAT '99:99:99')) AS CHAR(8)) AS TIME(0)) as old_eff_time
FROM tktestdb.testtb150;

FROM tktestdb.testtb150;

scriptLines: query: 'SELECT [eua].[ContractSectionID] ,[eua].[LastUpdatedBy] ,[eua].[IEContactID] ,[eub].[CanViewBordereauFlag] FROM [DestinyGlobal].[dbo].[FacExternalUserAssignment] AS [eua] INNER JOIN [DestinyGlobal].[dbo].[FacExternalUserBordereau] AS [eub] ON [eua].[FacExternalUserAssignmentID] = [eub].[FacExternalUserAssignmentID]',

query: 'SELECT DISTINCT
    f.typeId AS typeId,                     
    f.contractSectionId AS cosmosContractSectionId
FROM behaviors AS f
WHERE f.type = "contractSection"
AND f.isDeleted = false',
regions as (region as string, lastUpdatedBy as (email as string, userContextId as string))[],
users as (ieContactId as integer, emailNotifications as integer[])[],

source.sqlReaderQuery:
USE AdventureWorksDW2019

SELECT QUOTENAME(table_schema) + '.' + QUOTENAME(table_name) AS Table_name,Table_catalog
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE'
